bill.summary: 4/9/1997--Introduced. Securities and Exchange Commission Authorization Act of 1997 - Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to authorize appropriations for the Securities and Exchange Commission for FY 1998 and 1999. Itemizes certain miscellaneous expenses for which the funds may be used.
